name: 許華倚
objective: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意。不可壓縮流體、質量不滅、非黏性流體之運動、柏努力定律、線性及角動量定理及其應用、渦流與勢流、黏性流、納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及應用、管中壓力頭損失及增加、邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
schedule:
Chapter 1: Introduction
Chapter 2: Fluid statics
Chapter 3: Elementary fluid dynamics
Chapter 4: Fluid kinematics
Chapter 5: Finite control volume analysis
Chapter 6: Differential analysis of fluid flow
Chapter 7: Dimensional analysis, similitude, and modeling
Chapter 8: Viscous flow in pipes
Chapter 9: Flow over immersed bodies

9/18正式開始上課
materials: Fundamentals of fluid mechanics ( Munson, Young .., Wiley)
